description: Object containing information about income received from share schemes in the retrieved tax calculation.

totalIncome.description: The total income used in the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

type.description: The total income used in the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

employerName.description: The name of the employer the employee worked for.

employerRef.description: A unique identifier, the employer reference number.

taxableAmount.description: Taxable amount for the share scheme. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
